text: Nocardiopsis coralliicola is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from the coral Menella praelonga from the Weizhou Island in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis coralliicola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Nocardiopsis coralliicola
